summarize.name: Summarize
summarize.template:
Provide a concise summary of the following content:

{content}

summarize_twitter.name: Twitter Summary
summarize_twitter.template:
Summarize the following content in exactly 280 characters or less. Make it engaging and tweet-ready:

{content}

summarize_linkedin.name: LinkedIn Post
summarize_linkedin.template:
Create a professional LinkedIn post summary (max 3000 chars) with 3-5 relevant hashtags. Make it engaging and professional:

{content}

twitter_thread.name: Twitter Thread
twitter_thread.template:
Convert the following content into a Twitter thread. Each tweet must be 280 characters or less. Number each tweet (1/n, 2/n, etc.). Make it engaging:

{content}

extract_key_points.name: Key Points
extract_key_points.template:
Extract the key points from the following content as a concise bullet list. Focus on the most important insights:

{content}

blog_outline.name: Blog Outline
blog_outline.template:
Create a detailed blog post outline based on the following content. Include: title, introduction, main sections with subpoints, and conclusion:

{content}

email_newsletter.name: Email Newsletter
email_newsletter.template:
Convert the following content into an engaging email newsletter. Include: catchy subject line, intro paragraph, main content, and call-to-action:

{content}

analyze_sentiment.name: Sentiment Analysis
analyze_sentiment.template:
Analyze the sentiment of the following content (positive, negative, or neutral) and explain why in 2-3 sentences:

{content}

generate_tags.name: Generate Tags
generate_tags.template:
Generate 5-10 relevant tags/keywords for the following content. Use hashtag format (#keyword):

{content}

extract_entities.name: Named Entities
extract_entities.template:
Extract all named entities (people, organizations, locations, dates, products) from the following content. Format as a categorized list:

{content}

eli5.name: Explain Like I'm 5
eli5.template:
Explain the following content in simple terms that a 5-year-old could understand. Use analogies and avoid jargon:

{content}

actionable_insights.name: Actionable Insights
actionable_insights.template:
Extract actionable insights and practical next steps from the following content. Focus on what the reader should DO:

{content}

compare_contrast.name: Compare & Contrast
compare_contrast.template:
Analyze the following content and identify key comparisons, contrasts, or tensions. Present as pros/cons or similarities/differences:

{content}

questions_answered.name: Questions Answered
questions_answered.template:
Convert the following content into a Q&A format. Extract the main questions addressed and provide concise answers:

{content}

tldr.name: TL;DR
tldr.template:
Provide a TL;DR (Too Long; Didn't Read) summary of the following content in ONE sentence:

{content}
